title:
Can you find out and report on the status of Lincoln Forest storm drainage.  There are open ditches that allow Mosquitos to develop.  There is a large canal right thru the middle of the development.  



These ditches are a health and safety hazard.  This area has been in the city for about 50 years and still lacks this service.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/09/can-find-report-status-lincoln-forest-storm-drainage/
